title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service makes every effort to keep you informed about news events, special events, park programs and services and new or ongoing projects. News releases for Fort Necessity National Battlefield will be posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current about the happenings at the park. News Feed To subscribe to Fort Necessity's News Feed or to change the address of your news reader to our new News Feed address, follow the link to the right. What is a News Feed? Click here for more information. Receive News Releases Directly To receive Fort Necessity's news releases directly, click here to send an e-mail request to be added to or removed from the park's news release e-mail list. Please include your full name and e-mail address in the message. This database is never shared and is strictly for use by Fort Necessity National Battlefield. Social Networking Media To stay connected and learn what is happening at Fort Necessity through networking media tools and Web sites, click here.
